title: River Thames: conditions, closures, restrictions and lock closures (The Environment Agency)
text: ( Source : The Environment Agency ) River conditions Find out the latest river conditions and strong stream warnings by: visiting our River Thames Conditions website calling our Floodline on 0345 988 1188 or 0845 988 1188 ( 24-hour service) to
